section.name: Bob's webstore example.
section.p: Bob decided to use Beige-Webstore (it's included into Beige-Accounting) for selling his pizza.

At start it open menu -> Admin -> Webstore-admin. Then he fill trading settings:
He just set webstore name to "Bob's store" and set "Show Logo" to "true" - this is image in the file "static/img/logo-web-store.png".
Bob sell frozen and hot pizza to individual buyers and other business-makers. So he add several catalogs into "menu - Catalog of goods":
To add sub-catalog into catalog bob uses menu Subcatalogs in catalogs:

To add set of goods into catalog Bob uses very useful for big catalog bulk method inside menu Catalog of Goods - Goods. He just filter set of goods then push button Assign catalog (bulk) and set desired catalog for chosen goods. For example to filter all pizza hot with cheese he set filter "name like %cheese%" and "tax category = pizza hot":
Add those goods to catalog:
It will be report about added/removed to/from catalog goods.
* Warning! Adding already added item will fail whole operation!
